extends RedisException

    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        public static RedisConnectionException create(SocketAddress remoteAddress,
                                              Throwable cause)
        Create a new RedisConnectionException given SocketAddress and the cause.
        参数:
        remoteAddress - remote socket address.
        cause - the nested exception.
        返回:
        the RedisConnectionException.
        从以下版本开始:
        4.4

      • isProtectedMode

        public static boolean isProtectedMode(String error)
        参数:
        error - the error message.
        返回:
        true if the error message indicates Redis protected mode.
        从以下版本开始:
        5.0.1
